titleStmt.title: Saturday no sabbath, or, The seventh-day Sabbath proved to be of no force to the beleeving Gentiles in the times of the Gospel, by the law of nature, Moses, Christ being an account of several publique disputations held at Stone-Chappel by Pauls, London, between Dr. Chamberlain, Mr. Tillam, and Mr. Coppinger ... and Jer. Ives ... : together with an appendix in which the said question is more fully and plainly discussed ... / by Jer. Ives.
titleStmt.author: Ives, Jeremiah, fl. 1653-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Dan. White and Fran Smith,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
